scenario_text.value: Hey, Takuma. Haven’t had any luck out here.
Another false lead, huh?

I know it doesn’t help to get frustrated, but
it’s hard to keep my spirits up like this.
Maybe I’d better check somewhere else.
Yeah, maybe. Speaking of which, where’s Miu?

Right here! I’ve been checking in spots that
are too small for Kaito.
Not that I’ve found anything.

Well, I’ll check everything one more time
just to be sure. Takuma, keep an eye on Miu.

Come on, Kaito! I am more than capable of
looking around on my own, okay?

You worry about me way too much. It’s such a
nuisance!

(Miu’s poking the bear, as usual. She should
know how Kaito feels by now.)

(At the same time, he’s overdoing it again.
Miu’s fine on her own, after all.)
(What should I do?)
Maybe leave Miu alone?
Think of Kaito.

Kaito, why don’t you leave Miu alone? She has
Shakomon with her, after all.
Yeah, she’ll be fine as long as I’m here!

That’s not the issue. I don’t want to put her
in danger.
Don’t you trust her?
Ack... Th...that’s not what I’m saying.

I want to protect her from as much fear and
sadness as I can.
She’s...my only sister.

Yeah, I get it... You can’t just stop
worrying.

Exactly. I know she’s gotten strong, but my
feelings are what they are.

I don’t care how annoying she thinks I am,
I’m her brother⁠—her family!
I see... Guess that’s how it is, then.
Hmm? What’s this I hear about family?
Nothing! Don’t sweat it!
Hmmm?
Oh yeah, speaking of family, Takuma...
It just shows how much he cares for you, Miu.

I know that! I just wish he wouldn’t be so
focused on me all the time.
I don’t know what’s going to become of him.

You’re right, he is going to have to give you
some more space at some point.
Yeah, see? I’m grateful to him and all...

...but I don’t want him using me as an excuse
not to have a girlfriend. That’d be gross!

Ha ha, I can see it spiraling into that if
left unchecked.

Sounds like you worry about him in your own
way, Miu.

Well, of course. We’re family. I’d hate to
think what might happen if things went wrong.
Yeah, I can see why you’d be worried.
Right. You know, I wonder...

You think the professor and Miyuki felt the
same way we do right now?

The Professor and Miyuki? But aren’t they
total strangers?

Maybe, but Miyuki responded to seeing him,
right? I bet they’re connected.

You’re right. I wouldn’t be surprised if it
turned out they had some connection.
Hey, what are you two talking about?

None of your business! And did you really
check everywhere again?

Sure did, and there’s nothing here. Come on,
Miu, let’s go try somewhere else.
Hey, I can look around on my own!
Yeah, but I want you with me just in case.
So long, Takuma. Catch up with you later.
I said I can look on my own!

(I guess their relationship is going to be
like that for a while.)
Right, well, I’d better be moving on too.
Kaito, we already checked over there!
What? We did? I can’t even tell.

You’re so hopeless. I can’t leave you alone
for a second!
(Haha. Sounds like the tables have turned.)

(I shouldn’t get between them while they’re
acting so close. I’ll leave this to them.)
